commit.message: Recover from missing comma between enum variants

files.patch:
@@ -1,18 +1,26 @@
 error: expected identifier, found keyword `pub`
   --> $DIR/issue-28433.rs:4:5
    |
-LL |     pub duck,
+LL |     pub Duck,
    |     ^^^ expected identifier, found keyword
 help: you can escape reserved keywords to use them as identifiers
    |
-LL |     r#pub duck,
+LL |     r#pub Duck,
    |     ^^^^^
 
-error: expected one of `(`, `,`, `=`, `{`, or `}`, found `duck`
-  --> $DIR/issue-28433.rs:4:9
+error: missing comma
+  --> $DIR/issue-28433.rs:4:8
    |
-LL |     pub duck,
-   |         ^^^^ expected one of `(`, `,`, `=`, `{`, or `}` here
+LL |     pub Duck,
+   |        ^ help: missing comma
+
+warning: variant `pub` should have an upper camel case name
+  --> $DIR/issue-28433.rs:4:5
+   |
+LL |     pub Duck,
+   |     ^^^ help: convert the identifier to upper camel case: `Pub`
+   |
+   = note: #[warn(non_camel_case_types)] on by default
 
 error: aborting due to 2 previous errors

@@ -1,10 +1,20 @@
-error: expected one of `(`, `,`, `=`, `{`, or `}`, found `Bad`
-  --> $DIR/recover-enum.rs:6:9
+error: missing comma
+  --> $DIR/recover-enum.rs:5:13
    |
 LL |         Very
-   |             - expected one of `(`, `,`, `=`, `{`, or `}` here
-LL |         Bad
-   |         ^^^ unexpected token
+   |             ^ help: missing comma
 
-error: aborting due to previous error
+error: missing comma
+  --> $DIR/recover-enum.rs:7:19
+   |
+LL |         Bad(usize)
+   |                   ^ help: missing comma
+
+error: missing comma
+  --> $DIR/recover-enum.rs:9:27
+   |
+LL |         Stuff { a: usize }
+   |                           ^ help: missing comma
+
+error: aborting due to 3 previous errors
